https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/45FghqcdSYRWK7PsHUInaFPNd8l.jpg The true story of Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets had some unforeseen and long-reaching effects. Charlie Wilson's War
